prompt: Symptom: `git push` works on one machine but fails on another with `Permission denied (publickey)`. Provide H1/H2 and ONE discriminating test command.
Symptom: two PCs disconnect from a game every few minutes on the same Wi-Fi; Steam Decks stay connected (different house). Provide H1/H2 and ONE discriminating test.
Symptom: a Linux GUI app black-screens after update. Provide H1/H2 and ONE discriminating test that separates driver vs config.
Symptom: website fails only on one device; VPN reconnect temporarily fixes. Provide H1/H2 and ONE discriminating test separating DNS vs MTU.
Symptom: command works in one terminal but not another (same machine). Provide H1/H2 and ONE discriminating test about environment variables.
